content: whether giving candy cash or another creative notion fill a jar and top it off with this imaginative crochet graduation cap perfectly sized to fit the mouth of a standard mason jar and made complete with a tassel we ve used our sturdy lily sugar n cream yarn to give this project structure it s easy to create by crocheting in the round from the top down in one piece we like the classic look but feel free to go wild with any shades to please the new grad fill with anything you like for the perfect graduation party favor gift or snack souvenir materials 4 10 cm wide piece of cardboard for tassels 4 10 cm square piece of black cardboard for filling optional
